com.flyingspaniel.nava.emit

Class Emitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flyingspaniel.nava.emit.Emitter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Emit.IEmitter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EmittingCallbackFn

    public class Emitter
extends Object
implements Emit.IEmitter
    An implementation of a node.js-style Emitter, composed of a Map of Emit.IListenerList

    Warning: The generics (for "arg0") indicate what the listener expects as the first argument to Emit.IListener.handleEvent(arg0, more...), and are primarily for documentation and decoration. Internally there are unchecked casts and if you screw up you will get runtime ClassCastExceptions

    Since:
    Copyright(c) 2013 Morgan Conrad
    Author:
    Morgan Conrad
    See Also:
    This software is released under the MIT License

        Parameters:
